publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4559 Bill Butler: Knightswood Secondary School Under-18 Football Scottish Shield Victory—That the Parliament recognises the achievement of Knightswood Secondary School’s under-18 football team which won the under-18 Scottish Shield at Hampden Park following a penalty shoot-out against St Ninian’s High School; notes that this is the first time since the school opened in 1958 that Knightswood Secondary School has won the Scottish Shield, and congratulates the players, and team coaches, David Henderson and Ian McLeod, on the school’s splendid victory. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie*, Karen Gillon*, Helen Eadie*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Janis Hughes*, Maureen Macmillan*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Tommy Sheridan*, Pauline McNeill*, Trish Godman*

S2M-4559 Bill Butler: Knightswood Secondary School Under-18 Football Scottish Shield Victory—That the Parliament recognises the achievement of Knightswood Secondary School’s under-18 football team which won the under-18 Scottish Shield at Hampden Park following a penalty shoot-out against St Ninian’s High School; notes that this is the first time since the school opened in 1958 that Knightswood Secondary School has won the Scottish Shield, and congratulates the players, and team coaches, David Henderson and Ian McLeod, on the school’s splendid victory. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie, Karen Gillon, Helen Eadie, Roseanna Cunningham, Janis Hughes, Maureen Macmillan, Ms Sandra White, Mr Frank McAveety, Tommy Sheridan, Pauline McNeill, Trish Godman, Dr Elaine Murray*, Jackie Baillie*
S2M-4559 Knightswood Secondary School Under-18 Football Scottish Shield Victory (lodged on 15 June 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-4559 Knightswood Secondary School Under-18 Football Scottish Shield Victory (lodged on 15 June 2006) Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-4559 Knightswood Secondary School Under-18 Football Scottish Shield Victory (lodged on 15 June 2006) John Swinburne*
S2M-4559 Knightswood Secondary School Under-18 Football Scottish Shield Victory (lodged on 15 June 2006) Donald Gorrie*
